cast.name: 吉米·舍尔吉勒 Jimmy Shergill
沙拉蒂·瑟斯纳 Sharat Saxena
麦都丽·巴哈塔沙尔娅 Madhuri Bhattacharya

introduction: Aspiring model, Rocky, is in love with Tanu and both want to get married. She introduces him to her father who instantly disapproves but relents when Tanu insists on marrying him and no one else. Rocky's friends decide to end his bachelorhood with a wild party, book a room in a hotel and invite a number of hookers to spice things up. Tanu's father finds out and together with Avi, who loves his daughter, decides to spy on Rocky, video-tape him with other women, show the proof to Tanu and ensure that she rejects him. On the day of the party, a doubting Tanu and several of her friends dress up as hookers and decide to gate-crash the party. And what they find there will shock them out of her senses.
